"Hm? Yeah, I'm taking a break.":
"It'd be great it I could veg out and do nothing, but
if someone sees me doing that I could end up with
some crazy orders on my lap. So I gotta look busy."

"That's why I figure if I drag you with me to the
Caverns I can take it easy and make you do all
the heavy lifting. What do you say?"

"*This client order on which you will have Zeno
accompany you will be easier to complete if you set
a password in the \"Party Info\" menu and select
the \"Restrict other parties in Multi-Party Areas\"
option when accepting it."
